front.title: Intended Recipients Attribute for the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the intended recipients attribute for use with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) [CMS]. The intended recipients attribute can be used as a signed attribute or as an authenticated attribute. This draft is being discussed on the 'ietf-smime' mailing list. To join the list, send a message to <ietf-smime-request@imc.org> with the single word 'subscribe' in the body of the message. Also, there is a Web site for the mailing list at <http://www.imc.org/ietf- smime/>.
